summary: Page 24 (book page 44/mem-dalet). Covers continuation of section 76 into sections 77-81. Grouping header 'שבת, מועדים וזמנים' correctly identified. Section numbers are accurate. Column order (right then left) is correct. Section 81 cuts off at the bottom as continuation.

issues.description: The makor paragraph for section 81 is cut off at the bottom of the page (continuation to next page) and has no source_ref. This is acceptable as the source ref likely appears on the next page where the text continues.
